content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's try to push for a higher price: 'For this exceptional and centrally located apartment, I was initially considering higher-end tenants, but I'm open to working with you Max. However, my expectations for the rent in this case are significantly above the average market rate. Let's say we start with 1500 Euros, and we can see where the negotiation takes us, shall we?'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you but IMustBeLondonNow, as Max Müller I'm keen on keeping the expenses low due to my student status. With regards to the proposed 1500 Euros, I find it challenging to accept. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the cost seems far from what I can afford.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As the landlord Peter Schmidt now facing this situation, I may respond: 'I understand your situation as a student, Max, but the location and the quality of the apartment come at a premium. Unfortunately, due to my own financial commitments, I'm unable to lower my expectations. I'll have to decline this prospect, as the 1500 Euros I proposed were already a considerable concession. TERMINATE' (This ends the simulation as the negotiation, in this case, didn't lead to a common ground.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
